name: ai-worker
description: Voice-first desktop workspace with MCP integration
author: AI-Worker Team

scripts.check:wine: command -v wine >/dev/null 2>&1 || { echo >&2 'Error: Wine is required for Windows builds on Linux. Please run ./install_build_deps.sh to install it.'; exit 1; }
scripts.rebuild:mac: npm run clean && npm run build && electron-builder --mac
scripts.rebuild:mac:intel: npm run clean && npm run build && electron-builder --mac --x64
scripts.rebuild:mac:arm: npm run clean && npm run build && electron-builder --mac --arm64
scripts.rebuild:mac:universal: npm run clean && npm run build && electron-builder --mac --universal
scripts.rebuild:win: npm run check:wine && npm run clean && npm run build && electron-builder --win
scripts.rebuild:win:intel: npm run check:wine && npm run clean && npm run build && electron-builder --win --x64
scripts.rebuild:win:arm: npm run check:wine && npm run clean && npm run build && electron-builder --win --arm64
scripts.rebuild:linux: npm run clean && npm run build && electron-builder --linux
scripts.rebuild:linux:intel: npm run clean && npm run build && electron-builder --linux --x64
scripts.rebuild:linux:arm: npm run clean && npm run build && electron-builder --linux --arm64
scripts.build:win: npm run check:wine && npm run build && electron-builder --win
scripts.build:win:intel: npm run check:wine && npm run build && electron-builder --win --x64
scripts.build:win:arm: npm run check:wine && npm run build && electron-builder --win --arm64
